legal_basis: subsection 41(1)(e) of the Canadian Human Rights Act
decision_reasoning: complaint was outside the one-year limit
procedural_fairness: Commission acted reasonably in not extending the time
application_details: Mr. Johnston argued his complaint was timely or should have had the time limit extended
procedure_followed: Judicial review assessed whether the Commission erred in dismissing the complaint based on timeliness and procedural fairness
result_of_case: The court dismissed the application, upholding the Commission's decision
